/**
 * The ApptBean class represents an appointment object with various attributes such as appointment type, patient ID, handicap value, date, and comment.
 * This class provides methods to retrieve and set these attributes, allowing for easy manipulation and management of appointment data.
 * 
 * Main functionalities include:
 * - Retrieving and setting the appointment type
 * - Retrieving and setting the patient ID
 * - Retrieving and setting the handicap value
 * - Retrieving and setting the date of the appointment
 * - Retrieving and setting any additional comments related to the appointment
 * 
 * The class ensures data encapsulation by providing private variables for each attribute and public getter and setter methods to access and modify these attributes.
 * Additionally, the class includes comprehensive JavaDoc comments for each method, describing their purpose and usage.
 * 
 * Overall, the ApptBean class serves as a convenient and efficient way to manage appointment data within a Java application.
 */
